property.name: Move existing fighters to new carriers
notes
property.value:
D-Day
Marp created by Dagon81

This version created by Roger Cooper

Allies must capture all 3 cities to win in 12 turns to win.

Based upon the Axis & Allies D-day game. Note that reinforcements do no follow the charts, but instead come in randomly. Combat is limited to 1 round.

Turn off Game/User Notifications/Show Trigger Condition chance
